text: God Kawnan ak Banabas ayɨp Sol ayɨp kɨlop kod mɨdaknɨŋ, bɨ Jon Mak nop wog chɨnop ogɨnap gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, poŋɨd amnɨlak. Taun Selusiya ayaŋ amɨl, sip dɨl, man ñɨg tɨb kus gak Sayplus amnɨlak. Amɨl, taun Salamis amɨl, Banabas ayɨp, Sol ayɨp Juda apnan gɨpal kal okok amɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop God takaw agñɨlek.
